hero.title: Complete Escape from Tarkov Quest Tracker
hero.subtitle: Track your Kappa Container progression, quest items, and hideout upgrades. Free tool with cloud sync and automatic progress tracking.

quest.title: Quest Tracker
quest.desc: Track Kappa-required quests per trader. Automatic dependency handling and direct Wiki links for every quest. Progress saved with undo support.

about.tagline: Your personal assistant for tracking Escape from Tarkov questlines, items and hideout progression
about.title: About TarkovBuddy
about.description: TarkovBuddy is a free web application designed to help Escape from Tarkov players keep track of quest progression, required items and hideout upgrades.

feature1.title: Quest Tracking
feature1.desc: Track Kappa, Lightkeeper and BTR questlines with automatic dependency handling

feature2.title: Item Checklist
feature2.desc: Keep track of all items you need for quests and hideout

feature3.title: Cloud Sync
feature3.desc: Log in to synchronize progression across devices

feature4.title: OBS Overlay
feature4.desc: Display quest progression live in streams with OBS browser source

about.contactDesc: TarkovBuddy is a hobby project made by players for players. Have suggestions, found a bug, or want to contribute?
